ComicInfo.Title: The Dark Island; Island Heat
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-01 20:07:06. [CVDB160894] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:28:03. [Issue ID 351879]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dark Island: To get away from it all, Coley returns to Voodoo Island, with Kit, Harry & Lon in tow. Coley tells Kit the full story of what happened when he was kidnapped by Rev. Swinborne. He meets up with Maria, whom he knew from his previous trip, and asks her to dance with him for the tourists. Lulu, the voodoo priestess, warns him of "The Black Widow," a new sorceress on the island who's an "evil beetch." Coley saves Kit & Lon from a shark, almost at the cost of his own life.
Island Heat: On the deck of the sailing ship, Coley makes it with both Tina and Mark. On shore, Felix makes fun of Tina's boyfriend Darryl, for thinking he "knows it all." Kit leaves when Darryl & Lon decide to make out, but the two are attacked by a mysterious islander. Kit & Harry discuss the various personal entanglements, and Harry offers that "Life is much too important to be taken seriously."
